constraints.description: Employment contract maximum trial period is 6 months
Trial period contract can be terminated without notice by either party
Regular working hours maximum 8 hours per day
Regular working hours maximum 40 hours per week
Annual vacation accumulates 2-2.5 days per month
Study leave requires at least one year employment
Study leave maximum 2 years within 5 years
GDPR restricts employer to collecting only essential job-related information
Camera surveillance must not target individual employees or social areas
Email reading only permitted in exceptional cases
